title: #473: Dumbledore v Voldemort (OOTP 36, The Only One He Ever Feared)
description:
• Our next Quizzitch Live will be Tuesday, July 21 - An installment themed around the Deathly Hallows book!
  • Muggle Mail covers Kreacher, the Department of Mysteries, The Veil, Lupin and more!
  • Which came first, the Ministry or The Veil? Listeners weigh in with their thoughts!
  • We debut a new game... Guess. That. Book!
  • Chapter-by-Chapter continues with Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix – Chapter 36: The Only One He Ever Feared
  • 7-Word Summary: Voldemort is trying to kill Harry Potter
  • Neville consoles Harry following Sirius' death
  • The Cruciatus Curse: can Harry actually perform it?
  • What factors into one's ability to cast an Unforgivable Curse? Intent? Age? Character?
  • Bella, Bella, Bella!
  • Dumbledore vs. Voldemort... and the entrances fans have always wanted!
  • What does Dumbledore mean by "we both know there are other ways of destroying a man?" Is it a hint towards Horcruxes or his own personal life struggles?
  • The Symbolism of the Fountain of Magical Brethren
  • How does Dumbledore’s magic work both in the Death Chamber and in the Atrium?
  • Fudge's downfall
  • The hosts make some fun comparisons between the book and the movie!
  • MVP of the Week and Rename The Chapter
  • Quizzitch: What does Phineas Nigellus Black call Sirius when Dumbledore tells him he's dead?
  • This week's episode is brought to you by BeachBody On Demand (text 'mugglecast' to 30-30-30 for a free trial!), HelloFresh (get $80 off your first box by using code 'muggle80') and ThirdLove (get 15% off your first order by using the link!). Support MuggleCast by supporting our sponsors!
  • Join our community at Patreon.com/MuggleCast and receive magical benefits, including Bonus MuggleCast! This week we discuss whether or not Fantastic Beasts is the world's most problematic film franchise!
itunes:author: Harry Potter
